mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO M02_SYSTEM_VERSION ( IMSI , CHANNEL , VERSION , LOAD_PATH , DESCRIP , DEL_FLG , IS_FORCE , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{Imsi} , #{Channel} , #{Version} , #{LoadPath} , #{Descrip} , #{DelFlg} , #{IsForce} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE M02_SYSTEM_VERSION SET IMSI = #{Imsi} , CHANNEL = #{Channel} , VERSION = #{Version} , LOAD_PATH = #{LoadPath} , DESCRIP = #{Descrip} , DEL_FLG = #{DelFlg} , IS_FORCE = #{IsForce} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{Id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "Id" , IMSI AS "Imsi" , CHANNEL AS "Channel" , VERSION AS "Version" , LOAD_PATH AS "LoadPath" , DESCRIP AS "Descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , IS_FORCE AS "IsForce" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ID = #{Id}

SELECT ID AS "Id" , IMSI AS "Imsi" , CHANNEL AS "Channel" , VERSION AS "Version" , LOAD_PATH AS "LoadPath" , DESCRIP AS "Descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , IS_FORCE AS "IsForce" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ID = #{Id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "Id" , IMSI AS "Imsi" , CHANNEL AS "Channel" , VERSION AS "Version" , LOAD_PATH AS "LoadPath" , DESCRIP AS "Descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , IS_FORCE AS "IsForce" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
